Package com.composum.sling.dashboard.service

Interface StartupRunnerService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DashboardStartupService
    public interface StartupRunnerService
    a service definition to execute a configured set of groovy scripts automatically on servive activation the execution is registered in a status resource, normally a script is executed only of its last modification date is newer than the last execution of that script

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface Description
      static class  StartupRunnerService.MODE

      opens a reader to execute the script available as repository file resource
      void runGroovyScript​(@NotNull org.apache.sling.api.resource.ResourceResolver resolver, @NotNull Reader scriptReader, @NotNull Map<String,​Object> variables, @NotNull PrintWriter output, @Nullable org.slf4j.Logger logger, @NotNull String name)
      runs a grooy script provided by a reader in the context of the startup service configuration this script mustn't match the startup script patterns, its execution is not registered

      the execution of all configured startup scripts (the automatic execution runned on service activation)

    • Method Detail

      • runStartupStripts

        void runStartupStripts()
        the execution of all configured startup scripts (the automatic execution runned on service activation)

      • runStartupStripts

        void runStartupStripts​(@NotNull
                       @NotNull org.apache.sling.api.resource.ResourceResolver resolver,
                       @Nullable
                       @Nullable StartupRunnerService.MODE mode,
                       @NotNull
                       @NotNull Map<String,​Object> variables,
                       @NotNull
                       @NotNull PrintWriter output,
                       boolean force)
        the execution of all configured startup scripts in a given context
        Parameters:
        resolver - the resolver to use for script execution
        variables - additional binding variables, e.g. a 'dryRun' preset
        output - the writer for the output printed by the scripts
        force - if 'true' the scripts are executed always, not only if newer than on last execution

      • runStartupScript

        void runStartupScript​(@NotNull
                      @NotNull org.apache.sling.api.resource.ResourceResolver resolver,
                      @NotNull
                      @NotNull StartupRunnerService.MODE mode,
                      @NotNull
                      @NotNull String scriptPath,
                      @NotNull
                      @NotNull Map<String,​Object> variables,
                      @NotNull
                      @NotNull PrintWriter output,
                      boolean force)
        the execution on one of the startup srcipts, the script mustn't be listed for automatic execution, but it must match the configured script patterns
        Parameters:
        resolver - the resolver to use for script execution
        scriptPath - the path of the script to execute
        variables - additional binding variables, e.g. a 'dryRun' preset
        output - the writer for the output printed by the scripts
        force - if 'true' the scripts are executed always, not only if newer than on last execution

      • runGroovyScript

        void runGroovyScript​(@NotNull
                     @NotNull org.apache.sling.api.resource.ResourceResolver resolver,
                     @NotNull
                     @NotNull Reader scriptReader,
                     @NotNull
                     @NotNull Map<String,​Object> variables,
                     @NotNull
                     @NotNull PrintWriter output,
                     @Nullable
                     @Nullable org.slf4j.Logger logger,
                     @NotNull
                     @NotNull String name)
        runs a grooy script provided by a reader in the context of the startup service configuration this script mustn't match the startup script patterns, its execution is not registered
        Parameters:
        resolver - the resolver to use for script execution
        scriptReader - the script content
        variables - additional binding variables, e.g. a 'dryRun' preset
        output - the writer for the output printed by the scripts
        logger - the logger to use during script execution
        name - the name of the script

      • openScript

        @Nullable
@Nullable Reader openScript​(@NotNull
                            @NotNull org.apache.sling.api.resource.ResourceResolver resolver,
                            @NotNull
                            @NotNull ClassLoader classLoader,
                            @Nullable
                            @Nullable String scriptPath)
        opens a reader to execute the script specified by the given path
        Parameters:
        resolver - the resolver to use for script loading
        classLoader - the classloader used to load from bundle resources if the path start with 'resource:'
        scriptPath - the path of the script to load
        Returns:
        the reader to parse the script

        @Nullable

                            @NotNull org.apache.sling.api.resource.ResourceResolver resolver,
                            @Nullable
                            @Nullable org.apache.sling.api.resource.Resource resource)
        opens a reader to execute the script available as repository file resource
        Parameters:
        resolver - the resolver to use for script loading
        resource - the file resource
        Returns:
        the reader to parse the script
